channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1683; 09:43PM; 4020 N Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EyHSXC; #Brentwood; After establishing an anchor point (a point where the fire cannot retreat beyond), crews surrounded the fire with hose lines in steep terrain, while fire helicopters made water drops on the head of the fire. It took 36 firefighters 61 minutes to extinguish the flames in medium-to-heavy brush. No structures were threatened. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC9 E109 E19 E23 E237 E269 E290 E292 E69 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H2 H4 H7 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA7 T37 T69 T90 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1683; 08:42PM; 4020 N Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EyHSXC; #Brentwood; Approximately a half-acre of brush burning, with a slow rate-of-spread. Crews are responding by ground and air.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC9 E109 E19 E23 E237 E269 E290 E292 E69 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H2 H4 H7 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA7 T37 T69 T90 T92; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1075; 03:12PM; 833 S Fedora St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sH87Zf; #Koreatown; Firefighters found fire in the elevator room and elevator shaft, which caused smoke to spread inside the building. Firefighters on the roof cut holes to allow smoke and heated gases to escape, while crews were proactively evacuating residents. Thankfully the 50 firefighters on scene extinguished the flames in 25 minutes, and cleared the smoke from the building, allowing all residents to repopulate their residences. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E6 RA15 RA813 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1075; 02:47PM; 833 S Fedora St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sH87Zf; #Koreatown; Four-story apartment building with smoke showing from the roof (attic?). Offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E6 RA15 RA813 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0683; 11:24AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Firefighters made access to the three-story home, and ascended interior stairwells with hose lines. Fire attack crews located fire on the 3rd floor and in the attic, as ventilation crews went to the roof to cut holes for smoke and super-heated gases to escape. Ultimately, it took 47 firefighters 27 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EA1 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0683; 10:57AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Three-story craftsman home with light light smoke showing. Crews located a fire on the 3rd floor. Offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1359; 07:11PM; 1933 N Lemoyne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PuWSfm; #EchoPark; Firefighters found a three-story descending hillside home with heavy fire on the first floor (middle floor is at grade level). Flames climbed to the second floor, as firefighters made entry with water-charged hose lines. Ultimately, it took 34 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E235 E3 E56 RA56 RA850 SQ21 T20 T35; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1359; 06:48PM; 1933-1/2 N Lemoyne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZbkF7p; #EchoPark; Three-story descending hillside home with heavy smoke showing.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 E235 E3 E56 RA56 RA850 SQ21 T20 T35; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0097; 02:04AM; 2241 N Betty Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6ypQP; #BeverlyCrest; Thirty LAFD Firefighters took just 26 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire involving multiple vehicles within a detached two-story garage adjacent to a 2 story 2,400 square-foot hillside home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E97 E99 RA78 RA878 T78 T92; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0097; 01:38AM; 2241 N Betty Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z6ypQP; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Multiple vehicles ablaze within a two-story detached garage adjacent to a 2 story home. ; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 E108 E278 E292 E97 E99 RA78 RA878 T78 T92; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
